features.title: The Three-Phase Protocol
features.subtitle: A scientifically designed approach to liver and gallbladder wellness

items.title: Week 1: Preparation Phase
items.description: Gentle preparation with Chanca Piedra and Triphala to soften deposits and improve bile flow. Diet modifications help prime your system for the cleanse.

items.title: Week 2: Active Cleanse Phase
items.description: Intensified support with the Liver Gallbladder Tonic. This phase works to actively release stored toxins while Chanca Piedra continues to support gallstone dissolution.

items.title: Week 3: Restoration Phase
items.description: Focus on rebuilding gut flora with probiotics and continued enzyme support. Gentle transition back to normal eating while maintaining cleanse benefits.

items.title: Ongoing Maintenance
items.description: Optional continued support with curcumin and digestive enzymes for long-term liver health and inflammation management.

authority.title: Trusted Holistic Wellness
authority.subtitle: Curated by health professionals with decades of experience
authority.name: Holistic People
authority.bio:
At Holistic People, we've helped thousands of customers achieve better health through carefully selected natural supplements and protocols.

Our Liver Gallbladder Cleanse protocol is based on traditional herbal wisdom combined with modern understanding of detoxification pathways. Each product in this kit has been selected for quality, efficacy, and synergy with the overall protocol.

quotes.text: The liver is the body's master detoxifier – supporting it naturally is one of the most powerful things you can do for your health.
Gentle, consistent cleansing beats aggressive detox programs every time.

sections.title: Bile Flow & Gallstone Prevention
sections.description: Healthy bile flow is essential for fat digestion and toxin elimination. Chanca Piedra ("stone breaker") has been used for centuries to support kidney and gallbladder health.
bullets: Supports healthy bile production and flow

sections.title: Phase I & II Liver Detoxification
sections.description: Your liver processes toxins in two phases. Phase I activates toxins for removal, while Phase II conjugates them for safe elimination. This protocol supports both phases.
bullets: Liver Gallbladder Tonic provides targeted herbal support
Digestive enzymes ensure proper breakdown and absorption

sections.title: Gut-Liver Axis
sections.description: Your gut and liver are intimately connected through the portal vein. A healthy gut means less work for your liver and better overall detoxification.
bullets: Reduced toxic load from intestinal sources
Improved nutrient absorption supports liver function

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from people who've completed the cleanse

items.name: Sarah M.
items.title: Life Changing!
items.quote: I've tried many cleanses before, but this three-week protocol was different. The gradual approach made it easy to stick with, and I felt amazing by the end. My digestion has never been better.

items.name: Michael R.
items.title: Finally Found Relief
items.quote: After years of digestive issues and bloating, this cleanse gave me real results. The products are high quality and the protocol is well thought out. Highly recommend the Complete Kit.

items.name: Jennifer L.

items.quote: I was worried about harsh detox symptoms, but this protocol was incredibly gentle. I had more energy by week two and my skin cleared up significantly.

items.quote: The Premium Kit seemed like a lot at first, but getting everything bundled with a discount made it worth it. The probiotics and curcumin really helped with the restoration phase.

items.question: How long does the cleanse take?
items.answer: The complete protocol is designed for three weeks. Week 1 is preparation, Week 2 is the active cleanse phase, and Week 3 focuses on restoration. You can extend the maintenance phase as long as you'd like.

items.question: Can I eat normally during the cleanse?
items.answer: We recommend reducing processed foods, alcohol, caffeine, and heavy fats during the cleanse. Focus on vegetables, fruits, lean proteins, and plenty of water. A detailed dietary guide is included with your order.

items.question: Are there any side effects?
items.answer: Most people experience only mild effects like increased bowel movements or slight fatigue in the first few days. This is normal as your body begins releasing stored toxins. The gentle three-phase approach minimizes any discomfort.

items.question: Which kit should I choose?
items.answer: The Essential Kit is great for first-timers or those on a budget. The Complete Kit (our most popular) includes digestive enzymes and tea for optimal results. The Premium Kit adds probiotic restoration and anti-inflammatory support for maximum benefits.

items.question: Can I do this cleanse if I don't have a gallbladder?
items.answer: Yes! This protocol supports overall liver function and bile production, which is still important even without a gallbladder. The digestive enzymes in our Complete and Premium kits are especially helpful for those without a gallbladder.

items.question: How often can I repeat this cleanse?
items.answer: We recommend completing the full protocol 2-4 times per year, typically with the change of seasons. Between cleanses, you can continue with maintenance supplements like the Liver Gallbladder Tonic or Curcumin.

items.question: Is this protocol safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
items.answer: We recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before starting any cleanse protocol during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Some herbs may not be appropriate during these times.
